PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ordens
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_OV_ORDENSVIAGEM.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>((AREA IN (SELECT AREA FROM OV_AREASUSUARIOS WHERE USUARIO = @USUARIO)) OR ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OV_AREASUSUARIOS WHERE USUARIO = @USUARIO) = 0)) AND (A.TIPO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1406_at2046_hs8a6facfb.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
